184429.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ \n 第５回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストに:
Ladies and gentlemen!I'd like to introduce the
handsome men who will be participating in the
5th Astoltia Knight Contest!

184430.「総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた 上位５名と\n ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ３:
The top 5 winners from the 48 qualifiers, plus
3 specially recommended by Falpapa God,
totaling 8 handsome men, will battle it out!

184431.「まずは 前大会の覇者が 堂々の登場だ！ \n 敵か 味方か？ クールなポーカー:
First of all, the champion of the previous tournament makes a grand entrance!Friend or foe? You know, that guy with the cool poker
face that makes everyone nervous!

184432.「振り向いて！ でも振り向かないで！ \n 思い通りにならない彼に 心奪われる人:
Turn around! But don't turn around!Many people are captivated by the man who doesn't do what they want! Hyuza is a man with feline
attributes, even though he is a shark!

184433.「オレが 前大会で ナイトになれたのは \n 応援してくれた あんたらのおかげだ:
I became a Knight in the last tournament
because of your support. I thank you from the
bottom of my heart.

184434.「今回も 参加するからには 手は抜かねぇ。\n オレを 応援してくれるヤツらには:
I'm not going to cut corners this time either.
I'm going to give the top spot to those who
support me once again.

184435.「ゴーグル奥のするどい視線は どんな宝も \n 見逃さない！ 目利きの瞳で 見つ:
The sharp eyes behind the goggles will not miss any treasures! If you are stared at with the eyes of a connoisseur, you will discover a
new you!

184436.「ああッ！ 私もハントされたいッ！ \n かつて手にしたナイトの座を 奪い返せる:
Ahhhh! I want to be hunted too!Can I take back
the title of Knight I once held? Erudite
Inquisitor~! Raul!

184437.「宝は 手に入りにくいほど 魅力的……。 \n 一度は この手をすり抜けた ナイ:
The harder the treasure is to obtain, the more alluring it is.The Knight's position, which once slipped through my hands, is mine to
seize once again!

184438.「たとえ 地の果てまで さすらうことになろうと \n 目指す宝を 追う時間こそが:
Even if we have to wander to the ends of the earth, the time we spend pursuing the treasure we seek is the true treasure. Even if this
life is exhausted, I will not regret it!

184439.「さあ 続いて～！ 今年も悪いね 強制連行！ \n 毎度 ここまで連れてくるのも:
Come on, follow me~! It's bad again this
year!It's not easy to bring them here every
time! Enough of this resistance~!

184441.「寝ている間に 袋に詰めて 連れてくるなんて \n アンタら 悪魔ですかッ！ 日:
Are you demons to pack them in a bag and bring
them to me while I'm sleeping? Sleeping until
nightfall is ruining my precious plans!

184442.「何度 追い返しても 本ッ当にアンタらは \n しつこくて 執念深くて……\n:
No matter how many times we drive them away, you guys are persistent, vindictive, and insist on insisting on their insistence every
time!

184443.「ええと それではっ！ 気を取り直してぇ～！ \n お次は あま～いお菓子みたい:
Well, so what? Let's get back on track!Next up is the talented Purines, who is always ranked in the top ten for her sweet, candy-like
cuteness!

184444.「去年に続き 国を背負って 参戦だぁ！\n 最年少のピュアさを刃に 大人の男と渡:
Following last year, we are going to participate in the tournament with our country on our shoulders! Use the purity of your youth
as a blade to fight with grown men! Prince Raguas, the sweet bomb of Megistris!

184445.「また今年も この場に来られて 光栄です！\n ぼくに投票してくれた みなさんの:
I am honored to be here again this year! I
will do my best to meet the expectations of
everyone who voted for me!

184446.「時は満ちました！ 今年こそナイトになり\n メギストリスを 総べる者にふさわし:
The time has come! This is the year to be a
Knight, a champion worthy of being the leader
of Megistris, and I invite you to witness it!

184447.「さあ 続いて～ 王道ヒーローといえば \n この人以外は 考えられない！\n:
And now, on to the next one~ When it comes to heroes of the royal road, we can think of no one else but this man! The hot and fiery 1st
Astoltia Knight!

184448.「皆の心を ヤケドするほど 燃やし尽くして\n 再び ナイトの栄冠を 手に入れろ:
Burn everyone's hearts to a crisp and win the
Knight's crown again! Hero of the Red Flame~!
Zankrone!

184449.「会いたかったぜ！ みんな！ \n 求める声が あるかぎり……\n オレは 何度:
I missed you guys! I missed you all!As long as
there are people who want me, I'll come back
again and again!

184450.「オレと みんなの 心のキズナは\n 熱く燃え続け 永遠に 消えることはない！\:
The kizuna between my heart and everyone
else's is burning hot and will never fade!
Let's show that strength one more time!

184451.「予選通過者は 以上 ５名ッ！！ \n 続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別:
These are the five qualifiers!Next, Falpapa
will introduce the three special
nominees.......!

184452.「こっからの ３名は 全員ニューフェイス！ \n まずは 高貴な血筋に 軍団長を:
The next three members are all new faces!First of all, they have noble bloodlines and the ability to be a corps leader! In addition,
they are good looking guys with very high specs!

184453.「融通きかない ひたむきさは 若さゆえ！ \n その青さに ノックアウトされる人:
Inflexible, single-minded, single-minded, because of her youth!Many people are knocked out by his blueness, and he is the leader of
the intuitive Purines Army~! Quard!

184454.「このように おかしな催しの場に出るのも\n 国王の息子という 俺の立場では\n:
I guess it's inevitable in my position as the
son of the king that I should be at these
crazy events.

184456.「ではでは お次も エテーネ王国 出身者！ \n その卓越した剣技のウデは 国中:
Now then, let's see what we have next!He is well known all over the country for his excellent swordsmanship! The ladies were also
impressed by his courage in wielding two swords!

184458.「クオード坊ちゃんと同じ 壇上に立つなんて \n 王族の従者としては おそれ多い:
It's a fearful thing for a royal squire to
stand on the same stage as the Quard boys, but
it sounds like a very interesting event.

184459.「自分の得意な 剣技が活かせないのは残念だが \n ナイトの座とやらを 手に入れ:
It's a pity that I can't make use of my
swordsmanship, but I will fight with all my
might to obtain the Knight's position!

184460.「さあさあ ついに ラストの１名だっーーっ！ \n 暗闇の中から現れる ミステリ:
Well, well, well... Finally, the last one!That
mysterious and mysterious, sexy guy who
appears out of the darkness.

184461.「どっから見ても ただ者じゃないのは \n 明らかだけど その正体は 一切不明！:
It's obvious that he's not an ordinary person,
but his true identity is completely unknown!
Who the hell are you? Dark Swordsman!

184462.「……これも 時のさだめか。\n だが 我がチカラで あらがって見せよう。:
This, too, is the fate of time. But with my
strength, I will show them how it's done.

184463.「以上っ！ ８名の \n イケメンと そうじゃないのが\n ナイトの座をかけ コ:
That's all! 8 good looking guys and 8 not-so-
good looking guys will be competing for the
title of Knight!

184464.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory? It's you who
will be here~!

184465.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well, what do you think? How's it going? .There's a big group of very handsome men here, but honestly, who's my
favorite~?

184466.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら その人の:
Once you have chosen a handsome man who you
think fits the bill for Astoltia Knight, you
must help him bake cupcakes!

184467.「キミが カップケーキ作りを手伝った相手に\n キミの１票が 入るからねっ！\n:
Your vote will go to the person you helped
make the cupcakes! Think carefully before you
choose!

184468.「選び終わったら 話すことがあるから\n メリルの所に 来るべし！\n 外で待っ:
When you're done choosing, you should come to
Merrill's because we have something to talk
about! I'll be waiting outside, I promise~!

184469.「だが 勝負とあらば 正々堂々 受けて立とう！ \n エテーネ王国 軍団長の座が:
But if it comes to a fight, I will take it fair and square!I will show them that the position of Ethene Kingdom Commander is no
mere decoration!

184470.「だが一方！ 仕えた主人を 一心不乱に\n 探しまわる姿は まさに 忠犬！\n:
But on the other hand! The way he spins around looking for the master he served with all his heart is truly a loyal dog! He's a swordsman
who throws everything he's got into the fight! Faras!

184471.「じゃじゃーん！\n 第５回 アストルティア・ナイト コンテストの\n 結果発表:
Ta-da! We are going to start announcing the
results of the 5th Astoltia Knight Contest!

184472.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come on, come on, come on! Who will be the
Knight of White Chocolate Castle? Listen
carefully with your ears plugged~!

184473.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！:
Let's go! Everyone, pay attention to the
stage!

192908.「そのヒゲ！ そのハラ！ 傍若無人！\n ナイトの響きと 真逆をいくのに いつも:
That beard! That hara! The unmanageable! The King of Moldy Dumplings, always at the top of the list, even though he is the exact opposite
of what Knight sounds like! Lord Duston!

192910.「じつは けっこう 好きですよッ！\n なかなか いい ポンコツっぷりですッ！:
Actually, I like it a lot! It's a pretty good
junk!

192911.「おお～っと まさかの おホメの言葉！\n ちょっと素直に 喜べないけど……\n:
Oh, wow, a compliment! I can't be honestly
happy about it, but if it motivates me to keep
going, I'm grateful!
